statements: SELECT * FROM user_authentication;
SELECT username, encrypted_password FROM user_authentication WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_authentication WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM user_authentication ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, encrypted_password FROM user_authentication ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_authentication WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username FROM user_authentication WHERE user_id > 2 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_authentication WHERE user_id BETWEEN 3 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM user_authentication WHERE username LIKE '%a%' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT username, LENGTH(encrypted_password) AS password_length FROM user_authentication;
SELECT id, username, password FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, password, id FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 10;
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%doe%';
SELECT id, username, password FROM users ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE id = 2;
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE id = 3 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT u.id, u.username, ur.role_id FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.id = ur.user_id WHERE u.id = 4;
SELECT * FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_roles ur ON u.id = ur.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, encrypted_password FROM users WHERE id = 2;
SELECT id, role FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY role DESC;
SELECT * FROM login_attempts WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, user_id, success FROM login_attempts WHERE success = true ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, encrypted_password FROM users WHERE id = 2;
SELECT user_id, timestamp FROM login_attempts ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, username, role FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.id = user_roles.user_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_attempts FROM login_attempts WHERE success = true;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username, encrypted_password FROM users;
SELECT id, username, created_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM user_roles WHERE role_name = 'admin';
SELECT id, token, created_at FROM password_resets ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username, created_at FROM users WHERE id = 5;
SELECT users.username, user_roles.role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.id = user_roles.user_id;
SELECT * FROM password_resets WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT users.id, COUNT(login_attempts.id) AS login_count FROM users LEFT JOIN login_attempts ON users.id = login_attempts.user_id GROUP BY users.id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, encrypted_password FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, username FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_roles WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, timestamp, success FROM login_attempts WHERE user_id = 2 AND success = true;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT user_id, role FROM user_roles ORDER BY role DESC;
SELECT pr.user_id, pr.timestamp, u.username FROM password_reset pr JOIN users u ON pr.user_id = u.id;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(la.id) AS login_count FROM users u LEFT JOIN login_attempts la ON u.id = la.user_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING COUNT(la.id) > 5;
